name: AMADEUS IT GROUP S.A.
goal:
Amadeus is a leading provider of advanced technology solutions for the global travel industry. Customer groups include travel providers (e.g. airlines, hotels, rail and ferry operators, etc.), travel sellers (travel agencies and websites), and travel buyers (corporations and travel management companies).

Amadeus employs over 16,000 people worldwide, across central sites in Madrid (corporate headquarters), Nice (development) and Erding (operations), regional hubs in all continents and smaller offices, covering over 190 countries.

Mission: “Shape the future of travel”

Customer Segments:
Amadeus provides a comprehensive offer to the travel & tourism industry. These combine technology in distribution, IT, point of sale solutions and more, helping our customers to take advantage of the technology and convert it to business success.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Trade, Transport
